divs: sighting detailslast wednesday morning , on june 8 2008 my daughter lacey came home at 1:30 a.m. and took a shower and put pajamas on and me and the 13 year old summer was on the computer and summer noticed lacey missing and heard strange noises coming from behind the garage. summer came and got me and i heard them too... so we started running around and looking for lacey and she just disappeared and we couldn't find her anywhere and i looked in the sky and saw a huge ufo flying off. for some ungodly reason i heard a voice in my head tell me she would be back in two hours... so me and summer grabbed the rocking chairs and sat for 2 hours looking and waiting for her to return. then at 4:15 a.m. we saw red green and white lights blinking like christmas light flying fast over the house we ran to the back yard to watch and all of a sudden it started dropping down slowly and gases or fog was coming from the top of the ufo and i could feel my lungs feeling up from the gases.. when it got really close to the house there were big red and white lights blinking it never touched the ground and we saw bright lights and ran to the house and before we knew it lacey was sleep walking and coming to the front door and i asked her where have you been and she said i have been in bed and was thirsty wanting some water....we came inside and me and summer told her we saw the ufo and she laughed at us and did not know anything she argued and said she has been in bed since 2:00 am her face was greenish blue she scared me to death she started throwing up. two years prior she claimed she was outside and saw a ufo land in the field and fly off. she said she got scared and ran to her bedroom and within 30 minutes was woken up by a bright beaming light in her window and said she was taken by two green men through the window they never even opened it. she was scared for two weeks and would not go to bed without me being there and had put nails in the window. and she said it was like a dream...that she was uncertain whether she dreamed it or if it was for real....after me seeing the ufo the other night...i have no doubts in my mind she was abducted twice that i know of. please help us prove this and help her heal... she is so frightened she stays up all night and sleeps allday.. she's traumatized and i am scared also. please help us with finding... maybe a ufo hypnosist\psychologist and counseling ...we do not have the money to go to a private sessions but are willing to let ya'll research us to help us deal with these problems we are having... fear, anxiety, nervousness, can't sleep till daylight always feeling like we are being watched or going be taken.... please help us soon.....rhonda francis
Summary: My 18 year old was abducted at 2:00am and returned at 4:15 am
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hammond
There were no other sightings in Hammond on or around June 8th 2008
